title: The decision of C
clause_text: The decision of C.E.O., S.R.A. regarding possibility of in-situ construction depending on slum location shall be final and binding on all the parties concerned.
section: PREMIUM FOR OWNERSHIP AND TERMS OF LEASE

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
